name: Bee Chunks
flavor: Suit up when dealing with these chunks.

name: Cobra Chunks
flavor: Best to have health insurance before proceeding.

name: Worm Chunks
flavor: Sadly, these will not create more when cut in half.

name: Rat Chunks
flavor: Pieces of the fabled ratmouse.

name: Scorpion Chunks
flavor: They kinda look like Lobster Chunks.

name: Spider Chunks
flavor: They kinda look like Lobster Chunks.

name: Snake Chunks
flavor: Are they poisonous, or venomous?  I can never remember.

name: Parasite Chunks
flavor: Just thinking about them makes my head itchy.

name: Wasp Chunks
flavor: Burn them quickly.  They can smell your fear.

name: Bat Chunks
flavor: Only suitable for eating while visiting Micronesia.

name: Emerald Slime
flavor: Ingest this slime and you may hallucinate wildly.

name: Peach Slime
flavor: Absolutely the worst kind of slime possible.

name: Indigo Slime
flavor: Whoever named this slime probably used a thesaurus.

name: Ginger Slime
flavor: A delicious spice in full support of energy drinks.

name: Stinky Slime
flavor: You've been warned: don't smell it.

name: Clear Slime
flavor: Gives you incredible strength and makes you feel invisible.

name: Magenta Slime
flavor: An energy drink in full support of delicious spices.

name: Grey Slime
flavor: There are green numbers on the inside.

name: Cobalt Slime
flavor: Largely responsible for most of the heavy metal poisoning.

name: Technicolor Slime
flavor: Probably just a three-color slime, but the name is marketable.

name: Earth Crystal
flavor: It might just be a piece of dirt.

name: Psychic Crystal
flavor: It knows what you did last spring.

name: Life Crystal
flavor: Celebrities sell these crystals, promising relief from ailments.

name: Wind Crystal
flavor: Turn the crank and see what happens.

name: Lightning Crystal
flavor: A slightly worse version of the Storm Crystal.

name: Fire Crystal
flavor: Perfect for inspiring a tropical heat wave.

name: Ice Crystal
flavor: Soon it will be a water crystal.

name: Poison Crystal
flavor: Especially lethal if you stab someone with it.

name: Storm Crystal
flavor: A slightly upgraded version of the Lightning Crystal.

name: Death Crystal
flavor: All good things must come to an end.
